name: Ntower Cdefence
description:
Well... Just my small Tower Defence game made in Gamemaker Studio with home-made sprites. So credits: Me, Me and most importat me using Gamemaker and Aseprite

UPDATE! DESTROYING TOWERS! BUILDING PLACES!!!

CONTROLS:

<pMOUSE BUTTON! Click click everywhere</p>

Reqs: Resolution of the game screen is 1024x768 pixels, it can run IN a toaster, siund card? Anything that makes sounds is goooood

Features? 3 types of towers(2 working atm), enemies(1type), buildingplaces for towers and upgrades
